sentences.english: On the other side of the brook, there are many trees. There are lots of green bamboo groves.
sentences.chinese: 在小河的一邊有許多樹木，還有一片翠綠的竹林。

sentences.english: The lily of the valley in winter draw on emerald green breath.
sentences.chinese: 冬天的鈴蘭，吸引着翠綠的呼吸。

sentences.english: They saw Longjing tea is pure and fragrant and has a sweetish and mellow taste.
sentences.chinese: 他們認爲龍井茶色澤翠綠，香氣馥郁，甘醇爽口。

sentences.english: Towns in the populous trees, with hanging gardens of verdure.
sentences.chinese: 熙熙攘攘的城鎮，懸吊着翠綠的園林。

sentences.english: I am gazing out the window at the emerald green bamboo, which looks much higher than last year.
sentences.chinese: 我從窗戶看出去，翠綠的竹樹比去年長高了許多。

sentences.english: Ever green mountains verdure the accompanying distance between us.
sentences.chinese: 青山不老翠綠着我們相知相伴的距離。

sentences.english: Soon, we must head north to the verdant grasslands of Mulgore.
sentences.chinese: 我必須儘快把我的人民帶到北方莫高雷翠綠的草原上。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the effects of long-pulsed Alexandrite laser on hair removal.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討長脈衝翠綠寶石激光脫毛的臨牀療效。

sentences.english: What I saw were the slushy fields which were jade green in September.
sentences.chinese: 我所看到的是九月翠綠色泥濘的田野。

sentences.english: She lived at the old red mill on the green hill.
sentences.chinese: 她住在翠綠山丘上的老舊紅磨坊裏。

sentences.english: The lush bamboo groves remember the first time she went digging bamboo shoots with her brother.
sentences.chinese: 那些翠綠的竹林記着查利雲第一次跟哥哥去挖竹筍。

sentences.english: Reclining on green Cushions and rich Carpets of beauty.
sentences.chinese: 他們靠在翠綠的坐褥和美麗的花毯上。

sentences.english: The elegant culms and bright green leaves make it a charming ornamental bamboo.
sentences.chinese: 竹稈小型，竹葉翠綠，是一種良好的觀賞竹種。

sentences.english: In the backdrop of yellow sand, it is more and more green and full of vitality.
sentences.chinese: 在黃沙的襯托下，它越發翠綠，充滿了生機。

sentences.english: Both sides of the road were planted with fresh green mango trees.
sentences.chinese: 路兩邊都種上了翠綠的芒果樹。
碧綠的草兒覆上了翠綠的外衣。

definition: all the colors in profusion (idiom); a garish display
green grass like cushion (idiom); green meadow so inviting to sleep on
as far as the eye can see (idiom)
